title.narrative: 2015 ME043 Advancing Socio Economic Rights of Asylum Seekers

description.narrative: Children in the occupied Palestinian territory (oPt) continue to be denied their basic human rights. 2015 saw an escalation of violence between Palestinian civilians and Israeli forces and armed settlers, while the arrest, displacement, detention and even killing of children all remain major issues. This project ensures that refugees and asylum seekers fully enjoy their civil, political, social and economic rights according to International Human Rights Law. The aims is to advance these rights through awareness raising and advocacy.
